name: Regis Corporation
description: Regis Corporation is a leading hair salon chain in North America, specializing in a range of hair care services and products. Founded in 1922 and headquartered in Minneapolis, Minnesota, Regis operates a diverse portfolio of salon brands, including Supercuts, SmartStyle, and Cost Cutters. The company is committed to providing exceptional customer service through a network of skilled stylists dedicated to enhancing the beauty and confidence of their clients. Regis salons offer a variety of services, from haircuts and color treatments to styling and grooming for men, women, and children. In addition to its salon services, Regis retails a wide selection of professional hair care products, catering to the needs of its clientele. With a focus on innovation and quality, Regis continually invests in the training and development of its stylists to ensure they are equipped with the latest techniques and trends in the hair care industry. The company's mission is to be the preferred destination for hair care by delivering outstanding experiences and results, fostering lasting relationships with customers, and promoting growth within the beauty community. As of the latest reports, Regis is actively expanding its footprint across various markets while maintaining a strong commitment to sustainability and community involvement.
